text: Delroy Parkes is a male retired boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== Parkes represented England and won a silver medal in the middleweight (-75 Kg) division, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. Parkes was National Championship runner-up to Herol Graham in the prestigious 1978 ABA middleweight Championship, boxing for the Royal Air Force. ==References== Category:English male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Middleweight boxers
title: Delroy Parkes
